content: I understand POTUS doing something like this. He’s a fascist asshole. I understand Bannon . l wanting this. But what has crawled into the brains every republican member of the House of Representatives that makes tehm think this would be OK? Are these guys getting some kind of marching orders from POTUS/Bannon? Are they under some kind of threat? Am I getting as paranoid as POTUS? gheesh.
